welcome.title: Welcome to Credo
welcome.intro: For quite some time, I've been looking for a tool that would allow me to manage and understand all my loans and mortgages in one place, not just to calculate monthly payments, but to see the full picture and understand how different decisions affect them over time.
welcome.problem: Most mortgage calculators I found allow only single-action simulations, require re-entering all data for every calculation, and do not provide a real solution for ongoing management and tracking.
welcome.solution: Out of this need, Credo was built - a free system for managing and tracking loans and mortgages.
features: Managing multiple loans and mortgages simultaneously
Simulating additional deposits, interest rate changes, grace periods, and linkage
Examining the impact of a sequence of actions, not just a single point change
Saving all data locally in the browser (LocalStorage), with no data sharing or third parties
welcome.conclusion: The system is active, completely free, and intended for people who want to get a clear and in-depth overview of their mortgages and loans. At this stage, the main goal is to receive feedback from real users and improve the user experience.
